resources.string: Help me make this app better!

If you would like to help me translate this app into your language, please send me an email using the form below. Please provide your Github profile if you would like to be credited.\n\nThank you for your help in making this app better.
Hey Roland,\n\nI would like to help translate your app into \"%1$s\". Please give me access to the translation tool.
\n\nMy Github username is \"%1$s\", and I would like to be credited as a contributor.

Sorry, but sharing text files into shortcuts is not yet supported. It will probably be added sometime in the future.
You can, however, share text snippets already. See the documentation in the variable section for more information.

Thank you for your understanding.
